pkgmetadata.longdescription: Group Technical Effects // Implementation of the GTE (Group Technical Effects) model for single-cell data. GTE is a quantitative metric to assess batch effects for individual genes in single-cell data. For a single-cell dataset, the user can calculate the GTE value for individual features (such as genes), and then identify the highly batch-sensitive features. Removing these highly batch-sensitive features results in datasets with low batch effects.
